summary: A seventeen-year-old photographer gets caught up in murder when he breaks his own rules and falls in love with one of his teenage models.
cast: Nikki Reed|Jonathan Tucker|Julie Gonzalo|Michael O'Keefe|Haviland Morris|Dennis Boutsikaris|Frank Whaley|Brooke Mayer|Alessa Neeck|Christopher Jon Martin|Patricia Lewis Browne|Billy Powell|Thomas Tripiciano|Nick Lang|Ferdinand Jay Smith|Sarah Anderson|Sally Cohen|Doug Emblidge|Nicolette Hart|Arthur Brown|Mason Taylor Moore|Howard Jacobson|Rylyn Juliano|Marc Mayer|Angela Ryck|Elena Ryck|Stephen Ryck|Stephen Hunt|Jill Rittinger|Dina Corsetti|David Shakes|Kristin Vahl|Sarah Cassano|Tetyana Kamenyeva|Elizabeth A. Lincoln|James DiBella|Jamie Miller
title: Cherry Crush
